title: This Unit is a Flippin' Ninja needs to be brought back for the assassin update.

replies.body: dat +1 HP for each "ninja" on your team! cant even tell you how many times i survived with literally 1 HP because of this hahaha

> [{quoted}](name=Urf Mode Is Life,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IiEkqP5c,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-20T02:18:48.900+0000)
>
> dat +1 HP for each "ninja" on your team! cant even tell you how many times i survived with literally 1 HP because of this hahaha

um pretty sure its  was "ninja's work alone" "for every ninja on your team beyond yourself you lose 1 hp"
I'm curious to what would happen if {{champion:98}}  is at 1hp due to tower damage and then a friendly {{champion:238}} comes along, and kills {{champion:98}} would the announcer bug glitch?

the -1hp is as long as they are on the same team
and if you are somehow gaining teammates over the course of the game, i'd say you have more pressing things to worry about.

No.

Personally I'd be more worried if the enemy team was gradually gaining more members.
Well, If your teammates feed like bots then it's the same thing simultaneously.

{{champion:7}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:83}}

It's pretty scary.
I know, I was talking about {{champion:238}}  being on the same team as {{champion:98}} That's why i said friendly {{champion:238}}
The debuff is map wide, moving closer or farther has no effect on the lose of the 1 hp. It's permanent from the beginning of the game to the end.
you should have told me that earlier, now i have -25 upvotes :(
LIKE WHY IS THIS DONWVOTED
Unless you were using the doctor skins.
Pay2win
Do this for ADC's
Yes, this is correct. -1hp for each ninja.

y is this downvoted im lol

i miss the hidden 1 exp every 10 seconds passive for {{champion:76}}, given to players near you that are a lower level than you

granted yes it was 100% worthless.. but that was kinda the point for a hidden passive.. for shits and giggles
Why did she have that passive?

She is a cougar.
Cougar is also a term for certain older ladies that are after younger... prey.
and her dance...

she was a "cougar" and liked to be around "lower level" champs

If possible, at least make it available for normals only?
-Cough- Pirate Buff -Cough-
Yar! {{champion:41}}
As long as Talon gets: "This unit is flippin'. A lot."

Naw sorry dude. He's an assassin. For starters I'm pretty sure he'd have to be Ionian

Wasn't even aware they removed it

~~I guess they wanted to buff Zed in some minor ways~~
Please no. That was a debuff. Also I would like to point out that ninjas don't always work alone.

True, but a ninja would normally be hired as an assassin. The more that were part of a mission, the greater the chance of capture. A good ninja would be able to evade guards and take down only the necessary ones. It would be a samurai's job to storm a property.
Actually they're referencing the Law of Conservation of Ninjutsu. If you search it on tv tropes you should be able to find it.
I would love to be able to be a Flippin' Ninja again

I didn't notice they got rid of it.

I'm triggered

>This Unit is a Flippin' Ninja needs to be brought back

.
yeah bring it back thx

Ha I forgot about that.
One useless, but very cool easter egg.
